name: Floral Symphonie
description:
Floral Symphonie is a student project. It's a musical memory game with flowers!

Flowers from the hill need your help to grow a little tree. 
They are going to sing a melody, so try to play it back to make it grow! When they finish their sequence, click on them to replicate the melody. 

This game is based on famous musics. The atmosphere will take you back to your childhood!
